intake_process: Contact main office or SSVF program coordinator. Initial phone screening followed by in-person intake assessment. Veterans must provide proof of veteran status (DD-214) and income verification. Application process available by phone, email, or in-person visit.
service_area: Bernalillo County, Valencia County, Torrance County, and surrounding areas in central New Mexico. Primary service hub in Albuquerque.

intake_process: Call intake line at (505) 841-8424 to schedule appointment. Veterans meet with case managers for eligibility screening and needs assessment. Program targets very-low income veteran families (below 80% Area Median Income) experiencing homelessness or at imminent risk.
service_area: Albuquerque metro area and surrounding Bernalillo County, extending to Rio Rancho and northern New Mexico communities. VISN 22: Desert Pacific Healthcare Network coverage area.

intake_process: Contact organization by phone (575) 523-8813 or visit office for intake screening. Staff conducts eligibility assessment based on veteran status, homelessness/at-risk status, and income below 80% AMI. Case management provided following approval.
service_area: Do√±a Ana County and southern New Mexico region including Las Cruces, Mesilla, and surrounding communities. Serves lower Rio Grande Valley.

intake_process: Call main office at (702) 733-1181 to begin intake process. Initial phone screening for eligibility verification including veteran status (DD-214), current housing situation, and income documentation. In-person assessment follows for approved applicants.
service_area: Southern Nevada including Las Vegas, Henderson, North Las Vegas, and Clark County. Program serves statewide Nevada through multiple USVI locations and partnerships.

intake_process: Contact Salvation Army Las Vegas location at (702) 214-3800 for SSVF program information and intake. Rapid rehousing and homelessness prevention services available. Intake includes verification of veteran status, income eligibility (below 50% AMI), and housing crisis documentation.
service_area: Southern Nevada (Clark County including Las Vegas, Henderson, North Las Vegas area) and surrounding regions. VISN 21: Sierra Pacific Network coverage.
